author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MELISSA CONTINUES LOSING ORGANIZATION AS IT MOVES RAPIDLY NORTHEASTWARD... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS NOW OCCURRING ON BERMUDA...
summary: ...MELISSA CONTINUES LOSING ORGANIZATION AS IT MOVES RAPIDLY NORTHEASTWARD... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS NOW OCCURRING ON BERMUDA... As of 11:00 PM AST Thu Oct 30 the center of Melissa was located near 32.8, -67.5 with movement NE at 38 mph. The minimum central pressure was 971 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 100 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...MELISSA CONTINUES LOSING ORGANIZATION AS IT MOVES RAPIDLY NORTHEASTWARD... ...TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS NOW OCCURRING ON BERMUDA... title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
